data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Stillwater Cove, California, USA (SWC001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Stillwater Cove, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway XTI Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2001-06-21. The instrument depth was 005 meters, in an overall water depth of 022 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
